data.name: College Kings - Act III
data.detailed_description:
ACT III IS BECOMING FREE

To celebrate the new era of College Kings, we are making Act II & III, completely free with the launch of College Kings 2 - Act I on April 14th.

Additionally, we are adding more content to Act III which includes the conclusion of the Europe trip and multiple brand new, voice acted sex scenes!

Anyone that's bought Act II or III before then will get a free copy of the official CK walkthrough, filled with 220 pages of guidance on how to get every scene, achievement and relationship in the game.

Wishlist College Kings 2 - Act I now:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1924480/College_Kings_2__Act_I/


About the Game


Act III requires you to have College Kings Act II.

You and the gang are headed to Europe! It's the perfect chance to strengthen those bonds you've been making or perhaps make some new ones?
Field trips are never short of drama however, and this one looks like it could end up at a breaking point. With Wolves, Apes & Chicks all on the trip the clash of personalities is coming through. Maybe you could spend some time away from the other students? ;)
A new hookup app called Simplr is going viral back on campus, so it's time to find out how you match up in Europe...
It's not all love and romance though as you must have your wits about you and remember your fraternity training so far, you never know when you'll get a chance to prove yourself for the summer showdown.

data.short_description: You and the gang are headed to Europe! It's the perfect chance to strengthen those bonds you've been making or perhaps make some new ones? With lots of local culture to experience, who you hang out with will make or break your time abroad.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
College Kings contains sexual depictions, violence and drug references. Not intended for audiences under 18 years old. 
All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are over 18 years old.
